attributes.action: tax everyone equally the same set percentage of their income rather than in bands.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that tax should be a set percentage (say 10%) of income rather than taxing different people at different rates. This would create a fair means-tested system whereby those who earn more pay more but no body pays disproportionately more or less than anyone else.
